棃字的基本解释

棃
lí
同“梨”。

棃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》力脂切，平脂，來。］
亦作“梸1”。亦作“棃1”。
(1)果木名。落叶乔木，叶子卵形。花多为白色。果实多汁，可食。
(2)梨树的果实。
(3)草名。
(4)年老。
(5)通“剺”。割裂，剖离。
(6)通“黎”。参见“梨庶”、“梨氓”。

棃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棃； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页531第14
【唐韻】力脂切。【集韻】【韻會】良脂切，?音犂。【說文】果名。【爾雅·釋木】棃，山樆。【疏】在山曰樆，人植曰棃。【陶弘景·別錄】棃性冷利，多食損人，謂之快果。　又【揚子·方言】眉、棃、耊、鮐，老也。東齊曰眉，燕代之北鄙曰棃。【詩·大雅·行葦傳】耇，凍棃也。賈云：凍棃色似老人面有浮垢。　又通剺。【揚雄·長楊賦】分棃單于，磔裂屬國。【淮南子·齊俗訓】伐楩、枏、豫章而剖棃之。　又蛤棃，蟲名。【淮南子·道應訓】盧敖倦龜殻而受蛤棃。　又【崔豹·古今註】蜻蛉之小而黃者曰胡棃。　又草名。【山海經】大山有草名棃，其葉狀如荻而赤，花可以巳疽。　又【集韻】【韻會】憐題切【正韻】鄰溪切，?音黎。義同。

棃字的起名意思

暂无。

Deceive
Basic explanation of words
Deceive
lí
Same as "pear".
Deceive
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
["Guangyun" Lizhi cut, flat fat, come. ]
Also known as "梸1". Also known as "棃1".
(1) The name of the fruit tree. Deciduous trees, ovoid leaves. The flowers are mostly white. The fruit is juicy and edible.
(2) The fruit of the pear tree.
(3) Cursive name.
(4) Old age.
(5) Through "剺". Split, split.
(6) Link "Li". See "Li Shu", "Li Meng".
Deceive
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棃; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 531 14
[Tang Yun] Lizhi cuts. 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Liangzhi cut, sound plough. 【Said the text】The name of the fruit. 【Erya·Shimu】Zhan, Shan 樆. [Sparse] In the mountains, it is 樆, and people plant it as 棃. [Tao Hongjing·Don't Record] It's cold and profitable, and it hurts people by eating more, which is called quick fruit.　[Yangtze Dialect] Eyebrow, 棃, 耊, 逊, Lao Ye. Eastern Qi called eyebrows, and Yan Dai's northern Wei called Dian. 【Poetry·Daya·Xingwei Biography】Zao, Dongye. Jia Yun: Frozen looks like scum on the face of the old man.　 Then through. 【Yang Xiong·Chang Yang Fu】divided into Shan Yu, divided into the country. 【Huainanzi·Qi Suxun】Cut the Xian, Na, Yuzhang and dissected them.　Clam again, insect name. [Huainanzi·Tao Yingxun] Lu Ao gets tired of tortoise shells and suffers from clams.　[Cui Bao·Annotation of Ancient and Modern] Dragon Lace is small and yellow is called Hu Di.　Also cursive name. [Shanhaijing] Dashan has a grass name, the leaf shape is like a scorpion but red, and the flower can be gangrene.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pity and Qi [Zheng Yun] near the river,? Yin Li. The same meaning.
